A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A big thank you to Rian Johnson and his team for making probably the BEST Star wars film after episodes 5 & 4!!I thoroughly enjoyed it- whether it was the action scenes\, the cool Galactic battles\, amazing visuals\, great acting (especially by Mark Hamill)\, the background score by the great John Williams\, cool plot twists and shocks (you couldn't predict like half of them)\, the emotional appeal  and a compelling story! This film not only washes away the bad remnants of the prequels but pays ode to the original trilogy. It's probably the most original SW film I could ever ask for. Can't wait for Episode 9!
